mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, u.id AS authorId, u.username AS author, u.avatar AS avatar, u.vip_level AS authorVip, c.id AS categoryId, c.`name` AS category, p.recommend, p.`level`, p.comment_count AS commentCount, p.view_count AS viewCount, p.created, p. STATUS FROM post p LEFT JOIN `user` u ON p.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{postId}
